title: Green
brief_description: Surfing set to music - documentary footage of professional male surfers from four locations across the world and featuring some 50 surfers. Heaps of slow-motion short-board action and a few wipeouts just to keep things interesting. Shot in Mexico, Australia, California, and Hawaii by producer/director Matt Wybenga. Some of the surfers featured include: Joel Parkinson, Mick Fanning, Andy Irons, Kelly Slater and Taj Burrow. Music includes artists DJ Shadow, Ziggy Marley, Single Handed and Coal Chamber.
